name: Endless Runner - Die
description:
There was a woman beneath the beauty of artificial nature, beloved by her parents and companies. She had already suckled to raise degeneration as a bartender.

One morning; she did not wake up. This snooze was not for her beauty for the first time. She slept till midnight diving deep in one endless nightmare.

She suddenly woke up in tears and sweating on her feet, looked behind… And, started to run like she used to.

Do your best and send your score on the scoreboard
